DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study investigate whether effect salmeterol combination fluticasone propionate blood marker airway inflammation maintain chronic dose whether effect influence time allergen challenge relative time dosing .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Fluticasone Propionate/Salmeterol In Asthmatic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A 12-week , randomised , double-blind , placebo-controlled , three-period , cross-over pilot study compare effect salmeterol/fluticasone propionate , fluticasone propionate placebo perpheral blood eosinophil serum IL-5 response allergen challenge asthma subject allergen challenge administer 1 hour 11-12 hour post-dose dose interval
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Informed consent . Outpatient . Male nonpregnant/nonlactating female . Aged 1855 . Diagnosis asthma . Prebronchodilatory FEV1 > 75 % predict . Using inhaled shortacting beta2agonists ( SABA ) inhale corticosteroid . Judged capable withhold SABA least 6 hour prior visit . Reversibility > 12 % 200mL PC20 < 8mg/mL . Demonstration atopy History lifethreatening asthma . Use proscribe asthma medication . Use antihistamines potent inhibitor CYP3A4 . Respiratory tract infection . Asthma exacerbation 4 week Visit 1 . Subjects exercise induce asthma . Concurrent respiratory disease . Other clinically significant , uncontrolled condition disease . Use investigational drug within 30 day . Allergic beta2agonists , inhaled corticosteroid excipients . Positive pregnancy test . Using immunosuppressive medication . Milk protein allergy . Factors likely interfere attendance . Current smoker exsmokers history > 10 pack year . Affiliation wih Investigator site . Medications may affect course asthma interact sympathomimetic amine .
